g.text: ‚úÖ Clean architecture, no backbone modifications, stable training
‚ö° Enhanced medium object detection, moderate computational cost
üé™ Enhanced small and medium object detection, highest performance
‚Ä¢ Input Projection: CNN features ‚Üí RGB-like (3 channels)
‚Ä¢ Feature Adaptation: DINO features ‚Üí YOLOv12 channels
‚Ä¢ Feature Fusion: Concatenate original + DINO features
‚Ä¢ Spatial Consistency: Bilinear interpolation resize back
‚Ä¢ Freezing Support: Optional backbone weight freezing
‚Ä¢ ViT Models: vits16, vitb16, vitl16, vith16_plus, vit7b16
‚Ä¢ ConvNeXt: tiny, small, base, large (CNN-ViT hybrid)
‚Ä¢ Performance: +5-18% mAP improvement over base YOLOv12

svg.text: DINO-YOLO: Integrating Meta's DINOv3 Vision Transformers with YOLOv12 Object Detection
